entries.title: ‚≠ê Runtime authority and admin boundaries clarified
entries.summary: Clarified the two-repository architecture with the runtime as the sole authority, a privileged local WinForms admin control plane, and a downstream read-only web dashboard consumer.
details: Reaffirmed the runtime as the authoritative source of state, snapshots, telemetry, and control.
Described the WinForms Desktop Admin as the privileged local interface with filesystem and process authority.
Confirmed the web dashboard consumes exported JSON only and holds no process or filesystem control.
Noted ongoing path configuration groundwork with no breaking runtime behavior changes.

entries.title: Alpha metadata corrected
entries.summary: Recorded the v0.2.3-alpha metadata refresh while keeping historical entries pinned to their original identifiers.
details: Captured the alpha metadata regeneration for dashboards and admin surfaces.
Preserved older entries at their historical version numbers for traceability.
Aligned exported JSON shapes for read-only consumers that render their own prefixes.

entries.title: Project resumed
entries.summary: StreamSuites monitoring resumed with live runtime snapshots while Rumble stays paused.
details: Removed suspension messaging and reinstated active monitoring language across public and admin surfaces.
Dashboard polling restored for platform status, heartbeat timestamps, and paused reasons.
Rumble kept in a PAUSED state while YouTube and Twitch monitoring continue.

entries.title: Project suspended
entries.summary: Historical suspension notice preserved for reference after unstable ingestion halted progress.
details: Documented the pause triggered by unreliable external chat ingestion.
Recorded mitigation attempts and export shapes used during the suspension.
Superseded by the late-December resumption while keeping the historical record intact.

entries.title: Public surface refresh
entries.summary: Public static shells gained roadmap parity, glass treatments, and consistent badges.
details: Delivered refreshed public pages for support, tools, about, privacy, changelog, and accessibility.
Mirrored dashboard roadmap snapshots with expandable rows and legends on public pages.
Aligned CTA sweeps, dotted grids, and badge rendering across public shells for consistency.

entries.title: Quota enforcement hardened
entries.summary: Daily quota enforcement stabilized across platforms with consolidated registry handling.
details: Consolidated QuotaRegistry behavior across platforms.
Stabilized snapshot export cadence for downstream readers.
Confirmed dashboard visibility remains read-only for quota data.

entries.title: Read-only runtime scaffolding
entries.summary: Ensured static rendering paths stay deterministic and versioned for public previews.
details: Swapped roadmap progress bars to native <progress> elements for deterministic rendering.
Stabilized version badge rendering across public shells to mirror runtime conventions.
Kept gradient sweeps and glass treatments runtime-safe for GitHub Pages delivery.

entries.title: Dashboard roadmap foundations
entries.summary: Documented roadmap intent and aligned progress displays with dashboard styling.
details: Published initial public previews for clips, polls, tallies, and scoreboards.
Documented automation hooks, chat triggers, and upload planning for visibility.
Kept roadmap legends and progress indicators consistent across dashboard and public shells.
